REST controller for managing integrated tools within the OpenFrame platform, providing endpoints to retrieve tools with filtering capabilities and available filter options.

## Key Components

- **ToolController**: Main REST controller class annotated with `@RestController` and mapped to `/api/v1/tools`
- **getTools()**: GET endpoint that retrieves tools with optional filtering by enabled status, type, search term, and category
- **getToolFilters()**: GET endpoint at `/filters` that returns available filter options for tool queries
- **Dependencies**: Injects `ToolService` for business logic and `ToolMapper` for data transformation

## Usage Example

```java
// Example API calls to the ToolController endpoints

// Get all tools
GET /api/v1/tools

// Get filtered tools
GET /api/v1/tools?enabled=true&type=integration&category=productivity&search=slack

// Get available filter options
GET /api/v1/tools/filters

// Example request headers (handled automatically by framework)
X-User-Id: user123
X-API-Key-Id: apikey456
```

The controller includes comprehensive Swagger/OpenAPI documentation with detailed response schemas and error handling for 400, 401, and 500 status codes. Both endpoints support user identification through hidden request headers and provide structured logging for monitoring and debugging purposes.
